title: Indian Opposition Calls for Modi to Put US Trade Deal on Hold
description: India’s opposition called for Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s administration to put the nation’s trade deal with the US on hold and amend it.
content: India’s opposition called for Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s administration to put the nation’s trade deal with the US on hold and amend it.
